modName: Ashes and Flames - Spawn and Guardian Retex
summary: Retexture mod for both the Ash Spawn and Ash Guardian creatures, from the Dragonborn DLC. Not high-resolution work, just repainting only.
descriptionHtml:
[i][font=Trebuchet MS][size=6][center][/center][/size][center][size=6]Ashes and Flames - Spawn and Guardian Retex
[/size][size=2]
[/size]
[img]https://c1.staticflickr.com/5/4554/37894389854_399a3972c3_c.jpg[/img][/center]
[/font][/i][font=Georgia][size=3][i]It's a retexture of the Ash Spawn and Ash Guardian creatures. I just cleaned up the diffuse maps a tad, added some contrast to it, and sharpened some minor details. Normal maps were cleaned up, smoothed out and heightened to increase bump detail only. No real high-resolution work was done.

Diffuse maps are compressed.
Normal maps are [i]compressed[/i].

[i]The textures are twice the Bethesda High Resolution Texture Pack resolution sizes. [/i]

[b][u]Requirements:[/u][/b]
[/i][/size][/font][font=Georgia][size=3][i]- Skyrim 
- Dragonborn DLC

[/i][/size][/font][font=Georgia][size=3][i][b][u]Installation:[/u][/b]
[/i][/size][/font][font=Georgia][size=3][i]Just copy and paste into your Steam directory for your Skyrim installation.

[font=Georgia][size=3][i][b][u]Permissions:[/u][/b]
[/i][/size][/font][font=Georgia][size=3][i]Credits to Bethesda Softworks for their game.
Credits to CaBaL120 for his help and expertise.

[/i][/size][/font][/i][/size][/font][i][i][size=3][font=Georgia][i][b]My Mods:
[/b][/i]- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/86093/?]Dragons Resized[/url]
[size=3][i][size=3][i][size=3][i][size=3][i]- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/83328/?]Tree Faeries - Spriggan Retextures[/url][/i][/size][/i][/size]
[/i][/size][/i][/size][/font][/size][/i][/i][i][size=3][i][i][size=3][i]- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/73321/?]Seeker and Lurker - Creature Retex[/url]
- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/73385/?]Storm Atronach - Creature Retex[/url]
- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/69903/?]Bones and Scales - Armour Retex[/url]
- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/74871/?]Reflective Vanilla Armours[/url]
- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/80454/?]The Decayed Dragon - Durnehviir Retex[/url][/i][/size][/i][/i][/size][/i]
